about_the_game:
Panta Rhei is an adventure rogue-lite where time is your weapon. You take on the role of Phi, a Guardian of Time exiled in the Garden of Past since the Great Cataclysm. Phi spent eons tending to the garden, hiding from the outside world and neglecting their duties as a guardian. Now a chaotic force threatens to tear the flow of time apart, forcing Phi to leave their sanctuary and embark on a journey through the Realm of Time. A journey that requires Phi to face their shadows of the past and embrace their origin as a Guardian of Time to save their home.

TIME IS YOUR WEAPON




Phi's abilities to bend time allow you to manipulate the environment to clear paths or solve clockwork puzzles while exploring. They also allow Phi to revert their own last moves to double their effectiveness in combat or recover from lethal mistakes.

AN EVER-CHANGING REALM




The Realm of Time holds many secrets for you to uncover. Each location has its own challenges, gradually revealing more of the world as Phi solves side quests and cleanses the world. Gather and combine items in the world to craft unique strategies. Tend to the Garden of Past to maximise your chances for future runs.

BEHIND THE CLOCKWORK


Key Features
  • Abilities to control time which are seamlessly integrated in combat, puzzle-solving and exploration.
  • Narrative exploring time as humanity's most valuable resource and something we should be more mindful of.
  • Combat-heavy gameplay with a focus on melee combos and positioning.
  • The Realm of Time incentivises exploration to permanently alter the world to your advantage for the future.
  • Item crafting that lets players experiment with new combinations of powers and modifiers in each run.

short_description: As Chaos threatens to tear the flow of time apart, Phi, a reluctant Guardian of Time, embarks on a journey to the Origin of Time. Equipped with the ability to bend time, they face hostile creatures, solve puzzles and explore the Realm of Time in an adventure rogue-like where time is your weapon.
